Location.name: Location
Location.description: This IPSO object represents GPS coordinates. This object is compatible with the LWM2M management object for location, but uses reusable resources.

Latitude.name: Latitude
Latitude.description: The decimal notation of latitude, e.g. -43.5723 (World Geodetic System 1984).

Longitude.name: Longitude
Longitude.description: The decimal notation of longitude, e.g. 153.21760 (World Geodetic System 1984).

Uncertainty.name: Uncertainty
Uncertainty.description: The accuracy of the position in meters.

Velocity.name: Velocity
Velocity.description: The velocity of the device as defined in 3GPP 23.032 GAD specification. This set of values may not be available if the device is static.

Timestamp.name: Timestamp
Timestamp.description: The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.

Application_Type.name: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
